div.p: L. Moyer‐Horner thanks his field assistants for their efforts during long days of behavioral observations. Thank you to the staff and scientists at GNP for their support and cooperation. Very special thanks to Steve Gniadek for encouragement, comments on grant applications, and advice on working in a national park. The field work was funded by a grant to L. Moyer‐Horner from the Glacier National Park Conservancy. The Department of Forest & Wildlife Ecology at the University of Wisconsin‐Madison provided additional funding to help defray publication expenses.
